chat.msg: hi there, empezamos?
Si
cool. i'm at the start, near a twig
there's a small island with a tiger to the left, a butterfly south-east and a big island with a parrot south-west. which way to go next?
Keep going south-east you will see an elephant, a stone bridge and an island with a frog south-east .
alright, sea breezing! i see the elephant
should i cross the stone bridge to get to the frog's island?
Yes, please cross the stone bridge
ok, crossed it! i'm now chilling with the frog

Great! Now keep going west you will see a crocodile, past that crocodile there will be another stone bridge and an island with a giraffe. Once you pass the giraffe you will see a twig bridge south-east there is a snake on a tree and past that you will find the treasure chest.
ok, passed the crocodile, and i'm already good friends with the giraffe
now, i see the snake after crossing the twig bridge. oh wait, i see the treasure chest! we've done it, mate! *finished*

chat.msg: hola, estas listo?
Si
perfecto. primero, ve hacia el oeste, haz una breve caminata, pasarás por debajo de un banco de madera y cruzarás un sendero hacia un puesto de flores
pero no llegues al puesto. ¿me sigues?
listo estoy cerca del puesto de flores
¡genial! ahora gira a la izquierda, cruza de nuevo ese sendero y dirígete hacia donde estaba ese perro blanco
Ok estoy junto al perro
bravo! ahora ve hacia el sur, es decir hacia abajo en el mapa
vas a cruzar un arroyo y verás otro perro blanco
Ok estoy junto al otro perro blanco en un area de picnic
¡perfecto! ahora ve por encima del mantel del picnic
verás un cuenco de bayas, tócalo y continúa hacia el oeste
Listo toqué el cuento de bayas y me dirijo al oeste
muy bien! ahora encontrarás una rama de madera que cruza el río hacia el norte
Cruzé la rama de madera y estoy junto a un venado
¡increíble! pero no nos quedamos ahí, ahora pasa por el lado derecho de ese arbusto, sin tocarlo
listo
maravilloso, ahora sigue el camino hasta que llegues al puesto de flores de nuevo

chat.msg: hey there, estas listo?
Yes
awesome! i'm at the tent at the top of the map
should i head south towards the dog and the fire?
Yes, head south towards the dog, once you see the fire go around it then in between the fire and the bush you will see some mushrooms then head south-east until you see a car and wait there
alrighty, heading south towards the fire. found the red mushroom near it
now, i am south-east at the blue car. what's next?
Now go west on the trail and down south. Walk on the trail until you see a telescope
alright, i've walked west and south on the trail, now i see the blue telescope
where now?
There is a bush nest to the telescope walk south in between both and then turn west on the trail. You will see a cabin on a hill
gotcha! walking south between the bush and telescope, then west
i see the cabin on a hill. *finished*

chat.msg: hola, q tal? empezamos el juego?
Si
¡genial! mira esas tres palmeras
camina hacia la del suroeste
Listo
Listo
Listo
listo
buen trabajo! ahora gira a la derecha, te cruzarás con la segunda palmera
luego gira a la izquierda antes de llegar a la tercera

When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I'm more comfortable discussing the topic in the other language.
Do you enjoy mixing languages in conversation?

general_survey.answer: I like that people can express themselves in different languages, to me it just show important and proud people are of their heritage..
